Title: Chapter 2
Writer: Noah Hawley, Noah Hawley (created by), Chris Claremont (based on the Marvel Comics by), Bill Sienkiewicz (based on the Marvel Comics by)
Actors: Dan Stevens, Rachel Keller, Aubrey Plaza, Bill Irwin
Plot: With Ptonomy's help, David goes back in time to find a meaning in his memories. As he remembers his sister needs him, he tries to leave but Syd convinces him he's the key to everything.
